title: Hey Riot, could we get in-game voice-over options?
body:
Wouldn't it be cool to be able to listen to the champions in the language you want them to speak in?

Yeah I'd think so too.

As it currently stands (or as far as I know), we need to shuffle around the files ourselves or use 3rd party softwares to do it, while risking the chances of corrupting the files or worse, getting banned for it if something goes wrong, when it could all be very easily resolved if we all have the options to just click and be on our way.

I mean it affects nobody besides yourself, it creates no unfairness in the matches, nor is it particularly hard to code as a whole.

Please Riot, I wanna satisfy my weeb dreams, please help the humble me to make it true.

While it does work perfectly, that my game's VO is now in the language I want (Japanese, because well...),

But the game's written language becomes Japanese too, and I can't read them at all lol. And it would seem that voice-over and written language are bound together so you can't seem to change one without affecting the other.

Oh well...... 

I just hope there are options and ways to really only change the VO, as I really don't want to get into the file shuffling and mods businesses that other people seem to be doing. Rito please.
